advantages.title: Massive Scale
advantages.description: Experience the energy of a 40–50,000 capacity stadium show.

advantages.title: Iconic Star
advantages.description: Witness a performance by global superstar 50 Cent.

advantages.title: Universal Appeal
advantages.description: Music that transcends genres and generations.

advantages.title: Unforgettable Production
advantages.description: High-quality sound, lighting and special effects.

exclusiveOffers.title: Meet & Greet
exclusiveOffers.description: Get up close with 50 Cent and take a photo backstage.

exclusiveOffers.title: Exclusive Merch
exclusiveOffers.description: Limited-edition tour merch available only here.

testimonials.text: It was an unforgettable show! The energy was through the roof.
The best concert experience of my life.
50 Cent exceeded all expectations. Highly recommend!

faq.question: When will ticket sales start?
faq.answer: Sales start on June 1, 2025 at 10:00 local time.

faq.question: Where is the stadium entrance?
faq.answer: The main entrance to PGE Narodowy is located on Książęca Street.

faq.question: Can tickets be refunded?
faq.answer: Tickets are non-refundable; only exchangeable for another date in case of force majeure.

earlyAccess.title: Early Access Registration
earlyAccess.description: Leave your name and email to get early access to ticket sales and exclusive zones.
